trans-unit.source: Serves as a base class for derived classes that import SOAP transmission protocols into XML Web services.
Although this class is designed to serve as the base class for user-defined classes, the current implementation of XML Web services does not support such user-defined classes.
trans-unit.target: Embora essa classe é projetada para servir como a classe base para classes definidas pelo usuário, a implementação atual dos XML Web services não oferece suporte a essas classes definidas pelo usuário.

trans-unit.source: For more information about specifying protocols for XML Web services, see [[\<topic://cpconbuildingaspnetwebservices>]](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01dfc27c-c68e-4910-a0aa-5e4c2a766b0c).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre como especificar protocolos para XML Web services, consulte [ [ \<topic://cpconbuildingaspnetwebservices >]](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01dfc27c-c68e-4910-a0aa-5e4c2a766b0c).

trans-unit.source: For more information about Web Services Description Language (WSDL), see the specification at http://www.w3.org/TR/wsdl/.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre WSDL Web Services Description Language (), consulte a especificação em http://www.w3.org/TR/wsdl/.

trans-unit.source: When you inherit from <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.SoapTransportImporter" />, you must override the following members: <see cref="M:System.Web.Services.Description.SoapTransportImporter.IsSupportedTransport(System.String)" /> and <see cref="M:System.Web.Services.Description.SoapTransportImporter.ImportClass" />.
trans-unit.target: Ao herdar de <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.SoapTransportImporter" />, você deve substituir os seguintes membros: <see cref="M:System.Web.Services.Description.SoapTransportImporter.IsSupportedTransport(System.String)" /> e <see cref="M:System.Web.Services.Description.SoapTransportImporter.ImportClass" />.

trans-unit.source: The default implementations of these members perform no action.
trans-unit.target: As implementações padrão desses membros não executam nenhuma ação.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.SoapTransportImporter" /> class.

When overridden in a derived class, this method uses information contained in the <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription" /> object model (available through the <see cref="P:System.Web.Services.Description.SoapTransportImporter.ImportContext" /> property) to add transport-specific code to the class being generated.
Gets or sets a reference to the <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.SoapProtocolImporter" /> performing the import action.
A reference to the <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.SoapProtocolImporter" /> performing the import action.
trans-unit.target: Uma referência para o <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.SoapProtocolImporter" /> executando a ação de importação.

trans-unit.source: Derived classes can use this property to get detailed information about the current import context, such as the <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription> object model, the current class name, or the current method name.
trans-unit.target: Classes derivadas podem usar essa propriedade para obter informações detalhadas sobre o contexto de importação atual, como o <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription> modelo de objeto, o nome da classe atual ou o nome do método atual.

trans-unit.source: A URI representing the transport protocol to be checked.
When overridden in a derived class, this method determines whether the specified transport protocol is supported by the XML Web service.
<see langword="true" /> if the transport protocol is supported; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
